name: TwinsConversation
_source: s;Simon;Simon is fine. Unless other nobility is nearby.
s;Simon;Who am I speaking to right now?|I'm afraid I don't understand...|Your situation.
s;Twins;Right. It is a strange one.
s;Twins;When you first met us, you spoke to Tristan.
s;Twins;In my mind. Sleeping, I think.
s;Twins;Regardless, we were victims of a particular sorceress.|Sacrifices were demanded of our village, and we were young enough to be chosen.
s;Simon;That's terrible. I'm surprised you lived.
s;Twins;As were we! When she saw that her experiments failed, she let us go.|We've wandered since then.
s;Simon;I'm sorry that the Fates have been so cruel.|I hope things turn around.
s;Twins;They already have!{w} This place has been great,|and ever since we met I've been light on my feet!
s;Twins;You catch on fast.{w} I'm a bit more energetic than Trina, hah.|Now, I'm gonna go raid the wine pantry.|Catch you later.
